name: Cardflow for WooCommerce
author: Cardflow B.V.

sections.description:
With the Cardflow plugin for WooCommerce you can accept Cardflow gift cards in your WooCommerce webshop. Customers can enter their card number in the WooCommerce coupon field. Once the card number has been validated, the amount will be processed as a discount.

1.0.5

  • Tested up to WooCommerce 8.6.1

1.0.4

  • Tested up to WooCommerce 8.2.2

1.0.3

  • Tested up to WooCommerce 8.0.2 and enabled High-Performance Order (HPOS)

1.0.2

  • Tested up to WordPress 6.3 and WooCommerce 8.0.1

1.0.1

  • Bugfixing

1.0.0

  • First release of the Cardflow for WooCommerce plugin.

short_description: WordPress plugin for accepting Cardflow gift cards in your WooCommerce webshop.
description:
With the Cardflow plugin for WooCommerce you can accept Cardflow gift cards in your WooCommerce webshop. Customers can enter their card number in the WooCommerce coupon field. Once the card number has been validated, the amount will be processed as a discount.

1.0.2
